text:
I noticed, that in the attached test plan is still the old Server 
name "www.javasoft.com". to avoid the "temporarily moved" messages, set the 
server name to "java.sun.com". apologies.

OK, now I understand.

The HTTP defaults page has Path = hello

The Hauptseite sampler page has Path = index.html

The HTTP Request sampler page has Path = /j2se/index.html

If a field is suppled on a sampler page, it will over-ride the corresponding 
valued in the default page.

Perhaps you were expecting the default to be used as a prefix?

If so, then you can set up a variable once, and use that elsewhere in the plan. 
Have a look at the Functions reference (on-line version), and the FAQ.
creator: sebb@apache.org
